sentences.sContent: It’s 40 miles from here to the Polish border.
sentences.sCn: 从这里到波兰边界有40英里。

sentences.sContent: an area 50 miles wide and 150 miles long
sentences.sCn: 一片50英里宽、150英里长的地区

sentences.sContent: We walked about half a mile .
He was driving at 70 miles per hour .
sentences.sCn: 他正以每小时70英里的速度驾车行驶。

sentences.sContent: ...One of these countries contains less than a square mile of land...

phrases.pCn: 相隔千里，千里之外；心不在焉
（死刑犯从牢房走到刑场的）最后路程
三里岛（美国宾夕法尼亚州米德尔敦附近一岛，该地核电站曾发生灾难性事故）

words.tran: 参加一英里赛跑的运动员

trans.tranOther: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,760  yard s  or about 1,609 metres
